languages.text: Вольному Торговцу удалось найти координаты места, где капитан Саргона спрятал нечто ценное. Тайник находится в системе Тенебрис Акваэ.
The Rogue Trader has discovered the coordinates of a place where Captain Sargona stashed away something of value. The cache is located in the Tenebris Aquae System.
languages.original_text: Вольному Торговцу удалось найти координаты места, где капитан Саргона спрятал нечто ценное. Тайник находится в системе Тенебрис Акваэ.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader has found the coordinates of a place where Captain Sargona stashed away something of value. The cache is located in the Tenebris Aquae system.
The Rogue Trader has found the coordinates of a place where Captain Sargona stashed away something of value. The cache is located in the Tenebris Aquae system.

The Rogue Trader has discovered the coordinates of a place where Captain Sargona stashed away something of value. The cache is located in the Tenebris Aquae System.

languages.text: ローグトレーダーは、キャプテン・サルゴナが何か貴重なものを隠した場所の座標を発見した。その隠し場所は、テネブリス・アクエ星系に位置している。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has discovered the coordinates of a place where Captain Sargona stashed away something of value. The cache is located in the Tenebris Aquae System.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーは、キャプテン・サルゴナが何か貴重なものを隠した場所の座標を発見した。その隠し場所は、テネブリス・アクエ星系に位置している。

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat die Koordinaten eines Orts entdeckt, wo Captain Sargona etwas Wertvolles verwahrt hat. Das Lager befindet sich im Tenebris-Aquae-System
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has discovered the coordinates of a place where Captain Sargona stashed away something of value. The cache is located in the Tenebris Aquae System.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat die Koordinaten eines Orts entdeckt, wo Captain Sargona etwas Wertvolles verwahrt hat. Das Lager befindet sich im Tenebris-Aquae-System

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a découvert les coordonnées de l'endroit où le capitaine Sargona a dissimulé un objet de valeur. La cachette se situe dans le système de Tenebris Aquae.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has discovered the coordinates of a place where Captain Sargona stashed away something of value. The cache is located in the Tenebris Aquae System.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a découvert les coordonnées de l'endroit où le capitaine Sargona a dissimulé un objet de valeur. La cachette se situe dans le système de Tenebris Aquae.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha descubierto las coordenadas de un lugar donde el capitán Sargona ha escondido algo de gran valor. El alijo está en el sistema Tenebris Aquae.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has discovered the coordinates of a place where Captain Sargona stashed away something of value. The cache is located in the Tenebris Aquae System.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha descubierto las coordenadas de un lugar donde el capitán Sargona ha escondido algo de gran valor. El alijo está en el sistema Tenebris Aquae.

languages.text: 行商浪人发现了萨戈纳舰长秘密藏匿处的坐标，萨戈纳舰长的秘密宝藏位于暗水星系。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has discovered the coordinates of a place where Captain Sargona stashed away something of value. The cache is located in the Tenebris Aquae System.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人发现了萨戈纳舰长秘密藏匿处的坐标，萨戈纳舰长的秘密宝藏位于暗水星系。

languages.text: Hür Tacir, Kaptan Sargona'nın değerli bir şeyi sakladığı yerin koordinatlarını keşfetti. Zula, Tenebris Aquae Sistemi'nde yer alıyor.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has discovered the coordinates of a place where Captain Sargona stashed away something of value. The cache is located in the Tenebris Aquae System.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir, Kaptan Sargona'nın değerli bir şeyi sakladığı yerin koordinatlarını keşfeder. Bu zula, Tenebris Aquae Sistemi'nde yer almaktadır.
